overview:
Hagai has been the CEO of Plimus since 2008. With a reputation as a highly-networked and influential Internet leader and a flair for predicting and leveraging future Internet trends, Hagai guided dozens of internet start-ups helping them attain profitable growth and for many a successful IPO. Prior to Plimus, he also drove the Jerusalem Post online business strategy, and built Spark Networks into one of the world’s top online organizations.

As is the focus for Plimus, Hagai always remains closely focused on designing profitable business strategies and creating added value for his companies, their partners and their customers.
